address: 37th Lane, Wellawatte, 00600 Colombo, Sri Lanka
des: The apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher and an oven.

address: No:6/3, Falcon Residencies, Shrubbery Garden Rd., 00400 Colombo, Sri Lanka

address: 01, Fonseka Terrace, Havelock Road, Wellawatte, 00600 Colombo, Sri Lanka
des: The apartments have 3 bedrooms, a living area and a dining hall. It also an attached bathroom in the master bedroom and a visitor's bathroom. Other facilities include a 24-inch LED TV, a fully equipped shared kitchen featuring a stovetop, a microwave and a fridge.

name: The Queens apartment
address: Fonseka terrace havelock road 14, Wellawatte, 00600 Colombo, Sri Lanka
des: The apartment has 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an equipped kitchen, and a bathroom with a bidet.

des: The homestay is fitted with a cable flat-screen TV.

name: City Haven Colombo
address: 50 Jawatte Road, 00700 Colombo, Sri Lanka
des: The units at the guest house are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a bidet. All rooms at City Haven Colombo include air conditioning and a wardrobe.

address: Marine Drive , Colpetty,  Colombo 3, Kollupitiya, 00300 Colombo, Sri Lanka

address: No 28, Ramakrishan Road, Ben Tower. Apt 3/8, Wellawatte, 00300 Colombo, Sri Lanka

address: No 16, Flower Terace, Colombo 03, Kollupitiya, 00100 Colombo, Sri Lanka
des: All units are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave. A fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a kettle.

address: 5 Skelton Road, 00500 Colombo, Sri Lanka
des: All units in the guest house are fitted with a kettle. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with free toiletries, while selected rooms are equipped with a balcony. All guest rooms feature a desk.

address: 37 Frances Road Wellawatte, Wellawatte, 00600 Colombo, Sri Lanka
des: All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms include a private bathroom, while selected rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also boast a sea view. The rooms at A One Hotel - "The Marine" include air conditioning and a desk.

address: 30/2, Alwis Place, Kollupitiya, 00300 Colombo, Sri Lanka
des: Some units feature a terrace and/or a balcony with garden or city views.

address: 15A MAHASEN MAWATHA, 00500 Colombo, Sri Lanka

Featuring a shower, private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. You can enjoy lake view and city view from the balcony.

Rooms are fitted with a kettle, while selected rooms here will provide you with a balcony and others also have sea views. The units at Golden Pier City Hotel feature air conditioning and a desk.

name: Cinnamon Red Colombo
address: 59 Ananda Coomaraswamy Mawatha Colombo 03, Kollupitiya, 00300 Colombo, Sri Lanka
des: The hotel is just a 10-minute walk from Liberty Cinema Hall and 1,000 yards from Sri Lanka National Museum. Colombo Town Hall is about 0.7 miles away, while Bandaranaike International Airport is accessible within a 1-hour drive.

address: 46/10/11 Station Road, Dehiwala, 10350 Colombo, Sri Lanka

des: The hotel offers a continental or Asian breakfast.

There is also a kitchen, fitted with an oven, microwave and toaster. A fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a kettle. Seaview at Colombo features free WiFi throughout the property. Bed linen is offered.

des: Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Each room comes with a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and shower. Bed and Breakfast Colombo features free WiFi throughout the property.

address: Bawa Place 1, Borella, 00800 Colombo, Sri Lanka
des: At the hotel, all rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Other facilities at Royal Park Luxury 3Bedroom Apartment@12 include a spa centre and sauna. The apartment features free WiFi throughout the property.

des: The property is just 0.9 miles from University of Colombo and 1.1 miles from Sinhalese Sports Club. Bandaranaike International Airport is approximately a 30-minute drive away.

address: NO 62, ROSMEAD PLACE, 00700 Colombo, Sri Lanka
des: All units include a seating area. Some units have a dining area and/or balcony. There is also a kitchen, fitted with a dishwasher and oven. A microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a kettle. Bed linen is provided.
